title: Ennai Thaalaattum Sangeetham Lyrics Unnai Ninaithu
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Ennai Thaalaattum Sangeetham Lyrics Unnai Ninaithu

Ennai thaalaattum
sangeetham nee allavaa
unnai seeraattum
pon oonjal nee allavaa

unnai mazhai enbathaa
illai thee enbathaa
andha aagaayam
nilam kaatru nee enbathaa
unnai naan enbathaa

Ennai thaalaattum
sangeetham nee allavaa
unnai seeraattum
pon oonjal nee allavaa

nadhiyaaga neeyum
irundhaale naanum.
nee irukkum thooram
varai karai aagiren.

iravaaga neeyum
nilavaaga naanum
nee irukkum neram varai
uyir vazhgiren

mudhal naal en manadhil
vidhaiyaai nee irundhaai
maru naal paarkaiyile
vanamaai maarivittaai

naadi thudippodu
nadamaadi nee vazhgiraai
nenjil nee vazhgiraai.

Ennai thaalaattum
sangeetham nee allavaa
unnai seeraattum
pon oonjal nee allavaa

boologam or naal
kaatrindri ponaal
endhan uyir undhan
moochu kaatraagume

aagaayam ornaal
vidiyaamal ponaal
endhan jeevan undhan
kaiyil vilakkaagume

anbe naan irundhen
vellai kaagithamaai
ennil nee vandhaai
pesum oviyamaai

deepam nee endraal
adhil naane thiriaagiren
thinam thiriaagiren.

Ennai thaalaattum
sangeetham nee allavaa
unna seeraattum
pon oonjal nee allavaa

Ennai thaalaattum
sangeetham nee allavaa
unnai seeraattum
pon oonjal nee allavaa

unnai mazhai enbathaa
illai thee enbathaa
andha aagaayam
nilam kaatru nee enbathaa
unnai naan enbathaa

Ennai thaalaattum
sangeetham nee allavaa
unna seeraattum
pon oonjal nee allavaa
